Serialized Form

  • Package fotoshop.GUI

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.CachePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • scrollPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel scrollPanel
          The content panel for the main cache scroll pane.

        • cacheScroll

          javax.swing.JScrollPane cacheScroll
          The main scroll pane of cache buttons

        • imageSize

          java.awt.Dimension imageSize
          The Dimension used to set the desired size of the ImagePanel of each cache button and govern the width of the panel

        • cacheButtonMap

          java.util.Map<K,V> cacheButtonMap
          Map of the cache buttons. Each JButton refers to an instance of an image stored in the cache. The String key refers to the name the cache is stored as, and is passed to the JButtons ActionListener.

        • addButtons

          java.util.List<E> addButtons
          List storing the JButtons that are used to trigger the addition of the currentImage to the cache.

        • focus

          javax.swing.JButton focus
          The particular JButton that is being focused on. The button that is highlighted/bordered when open in the main editor

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.GUI extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • controller

          EventController controller
          Controller for passing commands from GUI components to the main editor

        • filterMenu

          FilterMenu filterMenu
          The menu in the menu bar for selecting and applying filters to the current image
          See Also:
          GUI.menuBar()

        • mainImage

          ImagePanel mainImage
          Main panel for displaying the current image
          See Also:
          GUI.center()

        • mainlabel

          javax.swing.JLabel mainlabel
          Label for displaying the name of the current image being worked on
          See Also:
          GUI.center()

        • undoPanel

          UndoPanel undoPanel
          Panel for displaying the stack of image instances and allowing user to undo changes
          See Also:
          GUI.center()

        • sequencePanel

          FilterSequencePanel sequencePanel
          Panel allowing the user to create a sequence of filters to be applied to an image and select the sequence from a number of buttons
          See Also:
          GUI.east()

        • cachePanel

          CachePanel cachePanel
          Panel displaying the cache of stored images, allowing the user to select one, retrieving it from the cache, or add the current image to the cache
          See Also:
          GUI.west()

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.ImagePanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • image

          java.awt.image.BufferedImage image
          The Image that this panel should display

        • size

          java.awt.Dimension size
          The size the image should be displayed at. This is a dynamic value and can change depending of GUI JFrame size.

        • x

          int x
          x position the image should be displayed at. This is a dynamic value and can change depending of GUI JFrame size.

        • y

          int y
          y position the image should be displayed at. This is a dynamic value and can change depending of GUI JFrame size.

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.UndoPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • buttonPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel buttonPanel
          Panel containing the list of buttons for previous image instances

        • undoButton

          javax.swing.JButton undoButton
          Constantly present button that will call for undo action on the last applied filter

        • undoFocus

          int undoFocus
          Focus of the undo list. The current instance that is being worked with. Highlights

  • Package fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar.FileMenu extends javax.swing.JMenu implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • window

          FileWindow window
          JFileChooser object for choosing a file to load from or save to

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar.FileWindow extends javax.swing.JFileChooser implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • dir

          java.io.File dir
          Current working directory to look in with the JFileChooser. Set by default to the "users.dir", but updated to the last directory opened or saved to.

        • frame

          javax.swing.JFrame frame
          Main GUI JFrame

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar.FilterMenu extends javax.swing.JMenu implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • menuFrame

          javax.swing.JFrame menuFrame
          The frame for the apply filter dialog

        • activated

          boolean activated
          whether or not the menu items are usable

        • activatable

          java.util.List<E> activatable
          Menu items that may be activated or deactivated
          See Also:
          FilterMenu.activate(boolean)

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar.FilterPanel_Brightness extends fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar.FilterPanel implements Serializable

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar.FilterPanel_Rotate extends fotoshop.GUI.MenuBar.FilterPanel implements Serializable

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.SequencePanel.SequenceButton extends javax.swing.JButton implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • sequence

          java.util.List<E> sequence
          Sequence of PropertyMessage objects, each containing the name of a filter to apply.

        • name

          java.lang.String name
          Name of this button

    • Class fotoshop.GUI.SequencePanel.SequenceConstructorPanel extends javax.swing.JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • messageList

          java.util.List<E> messageList
          The working sequence, list of messages (indicating the filter to apply)

        • sequenceName

          java.lang.String sequenceName
          name of the current working sequence

        • sequencesPanel

          javax.swing.JPanel sequencesPanel
          filters that have currently been selected to be in this sequence

        • thisC

          java.awt.GridBagConstraints thisC
          Layout constraints of the panel
